DOC.brief_summary: The study use comprehensive behavioral intervention adapt pregnant woman change dietary intake , eat behavior physical activity . The central hypothesis study intervention reduce excess gestational weight gain achieve clinical metabolic benefit obese overweight pregnant woman infant first year life .
DOC.brief_title: Interventions Reduce Excess Weight Gain Pregnancy
DOC.criteria: Age 1845 year In first trimester pregnancy Must willing join weight control program study BMI 2540 kg/m2 Willingness ability attend support group meeting either person via web Must able read , speak , understand English Carrying multiple fetus Gestational diabetes mellitus study entry Type 2 diabetes mellitus blood glucose > 125 mg/dl screen Self report current substance abuse Current smoking Alchol consumption 1 drink per day Preexisting medical condition ( include bariatric surgery ) use medication would impact study involvement outcome test Eating disorder past 2 year Depression diagnosis bipolar disorder Concurrent participation research study would impact participation investigation
